physicalFeatureDescriptions.description:
1. Spider web tattoo on the left elbow region.
2. Tattoo with the word “Hate” on the back surface of the 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th fingers of the left hand.
3. Tattoo of the word “Self” on the 5th, 4th, 3rd and 2nd fingers of the right hand.
4. Illegible tattoo on the right side neck region.
5. Tattoo of an arrowed woman on the left neck.
6. Tattoo of a woman's face, a profile on the right arm.
7. Mario's “BROWSER” tattoo on the pectoral region.
8. Tattoo of a woman with wings on the left arm.
9. Cross tattoo on the right side.
10. Tattoo of an anime woman's body on the left side.
11. Tattoo with a stuffed rabbit, a clown, the letters “R”, “F”, “C” and “M”, a skull on the right forearm.
12. Tattoo of a geometric figure on the left forearm.
13. Tattoo of the woman symbol in the penis region.
14. Tattoo of a syringe, the word “Art”, geometric figures and a devil on the anterior surface of the right lower extremity.
15. Eye tattoo on the right knee region.
16. Gargoyle tattoo on left thigh.
17. Eye tattoo on left knee.
18. Tattoo of a cross with a teddy bear on the left calf.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: Dressed in long dark blue pants, a red sweater and white, black and red moccasin style shoes, and wears an orange necklace with three keys.

physicalDescription.facialHairDescription: The facial hair consists of a white beard and moustache.

physicalFeatureDescriptions.description:
1. On the right shoulder there are several plaques with erythematous edges and pale centers that together measure 4½” x 1¾”.
2. Linear vertical scar on right shoulder measuring 3”.
3. Scar on right distal forearm measuring 1¼”.
4. Horizontal linear scar on right wrist measuring 1”.
5. Scar on the lateral edge of the left arm in the biceps area measuring ½”.
6. Linear scar on the abdomen measuring 11”.
7. Linear scar on the right side of the back, below the bend of the arm measuring 3”.
8. Scar on the posterior aspect of the right forearm, below the elbow measuring 2”.
9. Linear scar on the back of the right forearm measuring ¾”.
10. Multiple irregular scars on the posterior aspect of the right forearm.
11. Irregular and vertical linear scar on the lateral part of the right ankle.

physicalFeatureDescriptions.description:
1. Tribal type tattoo with a round configuration and green and black color. It is located in the lateral and postero-lateral aspect of the middle third of the right arm.

2. Cloth or sleeve tattoo with a scenic representation of a forest with mountains and multiple trees. This tattoo extends across the entire anterior, posterior, lateral and medial surface of the left forearm to the back of the left hand.

physicalFeatureDescriptions.description:
1. Linear scar in the left parietal region, measuring 2” long.
2. Linear scar on posterior aspect of right arm, measuring 1 ¼” long.
3. Irregular scar on posterior aspect of left arm, measuring 4 x 1 ½”.

1. Tattoo on the back of the right hand, with the letters “M”, “I”.
2. Tattoo on the posterior aspect of the base of the 1st finger of the right hand, with what appears to be a letter “A”.
3. Tattoo on the lateral aspect of the left arm, with a name that reads “PETRA” and a heart with a dagger.
4. Tattoo on the back of the left forearm, of a cross-shaped tombstone.
